words.definition: The ability to use a resource for maximum advantage.
words.arabic_definition: القدرة على استخدام مورد لتحقيق أقصى استفادة.

example.en: He used his connections as leverage in the negotiations.
example.ar: استغل علاقاته كقوة تفاوضية أثناء المفاوضات.

example.en: The company made a concession to secure the deal.

words.definition: A reply made to an offer with modified terms.

example.en: He rejected the offer and gave a counteroffer.

words.definition: Conditions agreed upon in a contract.
words.arabic_definition: الأحكام التي يتم الاتفاق عليها في عقد.

example.en: The terms of the agreement were clearly stated.
The dispute was resolved through mediation.
example.ar: تم حل النزاع عن طريق الوساطة.

words.definition: A specific provision in a contract.

example.en: The contract contains a confidentiality clause.

words.definition: Settling a dispute by neutral judgement.

example.en: The parties agreed to settle their dispute through arbitration.
example.ar: اتفق الأطراف على تسوية نزاعهم عن طريق التحكيم.

words.definition: A standard for measuring quality or performance.

example.en: We use this result as a benchmark for future projects.
example.ar: نستخدم هذه النتيجة كمعيار للمشاريع المستقبلية.

words.definition: Related to or required by a contract.

example.en: The agreement includes several contractual obligations.

words.definition: The use of resources or position to gain advantage.
words.arabic_definition: استخدام الموارد أو المكانة للحصول على ميزة.

example.en: She used her experience as leverage in negotiations.
example.ar: استفادت من خبرتها كقوة تفاوضية أثناء المحادثات.
